Memory induces coherence

Last updated on July 3, 2021

Over time, memories are nudged into worldview coherence through bodily incentives. This opens up the possibility of designing effective information networks, and planning memetic propagation. However, strong signals can also entrain dynamical systems, it’s only a question of magnitude differences between autonomous and external influences.

Resources

  • https://archive.org/details/Bartlett1932Remembering
